Package de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.pointcardrw

Klasse PointCardRWService.EscScale

java.lang.Object
de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.pointcardrw.PointCardRWService.PrintDataPart
de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.pointcardrw.PointCardRWService.EscScale
Umschließende Klasse:
PointCardRWService
public static class PointCardRWService.EscScale extends PointCardRWService.PrintDataPart
Class describing scaling escape sequences ESC|[#][x]C, where x is one of h or v.

    • getEscScale

      public static PointCardRWService.PrintDataPart getEscScale(PointCardRWService.PrintDataPart obj, int type, int subtype, int value, boolean valueispresent)
      Checks whether the specified esc sequence parameters form a scaling sequence. If so, it returns an EscScale object. If not, the object given as first parameter will be returned.
      Parameter:
      obj - An object containing corresponding sequence parameters or null.
      type - The sequence type (see EscUnknown, property Esc).
      subtype - The subtype (see EscUnknown, property Subtype).
      value - The value (see EscUnknown, property Value).
      valueispresent - The present flag (see EscUnknown, property ValuePresent).
      Gibt zurück:
      An EscScale object, if the sequence is a well-formed scaling sequence, otherwise obj.

    • validate

      void validate(PointCardRWService srv) throws jpos.JposException
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: PointCardRWService.PrintDataPart
      Used to perform full validation of the print data. To do this, relevant capabilities will be checked and the corresponding method of the PointCardRWInterface used by the given PointCardRWService will be called.
      Angegeben von:
      validate in Klasse PointCardRWService.PrintDataPart
      Parameter:
      srv - PointCardRWService to be used for additional validation.
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If not precisely supported with ErrorCode E_ILLEGAL, if not supported and no workaround is possible, with ErrorCode E_FAILURE.

    • validateData

      void validateData(PointCardRWService srv) throws jpos.JposException
      Used to perform additional validation of the print data, if print output occurs. To do this, simply the corresponding method of the PointCardRWInterface used by the given PointCardRWService will be called.
      Angegeben von:
      validateData in Klasse PointCardRWService.PrintDataPart
      Parameter:
      srv - PointCardRWService to be used for additional validation.
      Löst aus:
      jpos.JposException - If not precisely supported with ErrorCode E_ILLEGAL, if not supported and no workaround is possible, with ErrorCode E_FAILURE.
